name: Survival World 3D
description:
In Survival Wild World 3d you can expire adventures in a exciting post apocalyptic world. This survival game and animal simulator sets you into the role of a last, lonly survivor on a wild, mysterious and hostile survival island with diffrents biomes, animals and other sectes in huge caves.

-Fight and survive!-
Find food, explore huge caves, hunt for animals and mine resource to craft weapons, tools, equipment and furniture. But beware of dangerous wild animals like bears, lions, wolfs and cannibals which could get in battle with you.

-Be creative, craft, mine and build-
Be creative and establish your domicile on the island. Collect all resources and items to craft tools, weapons and buildingsparts in order create a save house which protects you against the dangerous wilderness.

Feature of Survival WorldIsland 3D
-3d survival game and sandbox game
-first person and thrid person camera
-realistic high quality grafhic
-large detailed and complex survival map
-diffrent biomes with caves and dungeons
-find food, hunt for wild animals(stag, boar, bear, lion etc.)
-find or mine resouce(stone, iron, ore, gold, wood, carbon)
-crafting system (use the collected rescouces to craft tools, weapons, buildingparts etc.)
-create your own wild domicle (diffrent bulding parts walls, floors, platforms)
-equip your caracter (huge variety of colth parts, by crafting)
-animal simulator (lion, bear, wolf simulator)
-figth against wild animals or zombies.
-battle system
